content.title: This website
content.description: My personal website that I created to show more information about me and my projects.

content.title: Cidade Alta Challenge
content.description: A project developed with Next.js and React. It's a dashboard that allows you to create and manage penal codes for the city of Cidade Alta.

content.title: Pedido Pago Challenge
content.description:
A dashboard developed with Next.js to manage collaborator's information. 
I also introduced tests inside the project using Jest and React Testing Library.

content.title: Byte

A simple blog with the focus on technology articles.
